securityGroupEgress.description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

userData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash
sudo yum -y update; sudo yum install -y ruby aws-cli wget ;         cd /home/ec2-user; wget https://aws-codedeploy-ap-south-1.s3.amazonaws.com/latest/install ;         sudo chmod +x ./install; sudo ./install auto ; sudo service codedeploy-agent status
